scripts.build-dist: npm run build && node packages/babel-polyfill/scripts/build-dist.js && node packages/babel-runtime/scripts/build-dist.js && node scripts/generate-babel-types-docs.js
scripts.clean: npm run test-clean && rimraf packages/*/lib packages/babel-polyfill/browser* packages/babel-polyfill/dist coverage packages/*/npm-debug*
scripts.test-only: npm run tests && npm run test-clean
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-only
scripts.test-cov: npm run clean && rimraf packages/*/lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=test gulp build && npm run cov-tests
scripts.test-ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run bootstrap && npm run cov-tests && node node_modules/codecov.io/bin/codecov.io.js < coverage/coverage.json
scripts.publish: git pull --rebase && rimraf packages/*/lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=production npm run build-dist && npm test && lerna publish --only-explicit-updates && npm run clean
scripts.bootstrap: npm install && lerna bootstrap && npm run build && cd packages/babel-runtime && npm install && node scripts/build-dist.js
